item.title: Still Undefeated! (Go Steelers)
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 14
item.itunes:summary:
In this week's episode Kyle and I follow up our perfect 5-0 of predictions last week with another 4-0 coming up! We also recap all the madness from last weekends games, discuss which one of us punched a wall, debate what aged NBA players we could beat 1 on 1, talk about Home Improvement, make you smile, and much much more! Check it out!
Bowl Mania Winners: Confidence: 1. Alex 2. Kyle Straight: 1. Michael 2. Alex
Shownote links: AC joint: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acromioclavicular_joint
Rundown: -Bowl Mania Winners (2:55) -NFL Recaps (non Steelers) (6:48) -Steelers game recap (14:37) -National championship recap (31:31) -Alex Win of the week (37:58) -Kyle win of the week (38:13) -Listener mail (42:05) -Duquesne basketball (48:16) -Chiefs vs Patriots prediction (50:02) -Packers vs Cardinals prediction (53:25) -Seahawks vs Panthers prediction (55:39) -Steelers vs Broncos prediction (57:23) -Kyle Sneak of the week, NBA 1 on 1s (62:15) -Alex Sneak of the week, NCAA practice time (66:21)
Episode mistakes: -None that we know of yet!
As always feel free to follow us on twitter at @TheScoutTeamPod and send us any and all feedback at thescoutteampodcast@gmail.com! Also please subscribe to us on iTunes or your favorite podcasting app!

item.title: Episode 10!!!!!!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 10
item.itunes:summary:
This week is the episode you have all been waiting for; the vaunted episode 10!!! In this week's episode we mix it up completely and talk about how we got our podcast names, how we started the podcast, our favorite and least favorite athletes of all time, our best and worst sports memories, make you smile, and much much more! Check it out!
Join our Bowl Mania challenge for a prize! Confidence picks: http://games.espn.go.com/college-bowl-mania/2015/en/group?groupID=97121 Straight picks: http://games.espn.go.com/college-bowl-mania/2015/en/group?groupID=97132

item.title: The 4-Peat
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 8
item.itunes:summary:
In this week's episode Kyle and I recap the Grey Cup (CFL Super Bowl), Kyle tells me he accomplished the thanksgiving 4-peat, we discuss college football job openings and conference titles, say our goodbyes to Kobe, uncover Jamie Vardy's racism, talk NFL, make you smile, and much much more! Check it out!
Shownote links: CFL Single: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5BFaykcxGg

(32:50) -Chip Kelly rumors (35:57) -Kyle sneak of the week, MLS playoffs (39:33) -Alex sneak of the week, CFL Grey Cup (43:15) -Thanksgiving break recaps (50:20)
Episode mistakes: -Michigan has not gotten two #1 kicker recruits since I've been here. We had 1 and then he was re-ranked as the #7 kicker -Jeremiah Masoli is on the Edmonton Eskimos

item.title: Episode 5 - Doping Scandal
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5 - Doping Scandal
item.itunes:summary:
This week Kyle and I recap the MLB Season, urge for change in a playoff system, bring to light a serious doping scandal, chat college football, soccer, make you smile, and much much more on Episode 5!!!
As always feel free to email us feedback at thescoutteampodcast@gmail.com or follow us on twitter @TheScoutTeamPod or subscribe to us by searching your favorite podcast app!!!
Episode mistakes: -JT Barret did not try to switch seats with Cardale Jones. I was confused because he tried to avoid the checkpoint (but was caught), not avoid by switching drivers. Also he is 20 so he was underaged and more than 4 times the .02 legal limit for that age.

item.title: Episode 4
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4
item.itunes:summary:
Our best episode yet!!! We have our own special intro thanks to Matt Farley and MoternMedia.com! This week Kyle and I talk about NFL, NCAA football, soccer, and a whole bunch of other funny stuff. If I could recommend one episode to listen to it'd be this one, so check it out!
And as always please send us any and all feedback at thescoutteampodcast@gmail.com
Episode mistakes: -None so far that we know of!

item.title: Episode 3
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 3
item.itunes:summary:
What are Kyle and I being for Halloween?! What 2 time Cy young winner emailed us this week and why?! Find out all that and more in this week's episode of The Scout Team Podcast.
If I'm being honest this week wasn't our best episode and we went 15 minutes over, but we already discussed how to be better next week and if you have any ideas or topics you want discussed please tell us at thescoutteampodcast@gmail.com
Episode mistakes: -We went long -Meant to say Miami is a great program instead of listing Florida twice -Jack Eichel is a forward (hence the minutes played being impressive)

item.title: Episode 2
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 2
item.itunes:summary: This week we have intro music!!! Also Alex talks about the heartbreaking Michigan loss, listener mail is read, Kyle talks about the must watch sporting event of the weekend and much much more! Also we have a new name "The Scout Team Podcast" so feel free to send us your feedback at thescoutteampodcast@gmail.com! Episode mistakes: None known at this time, please inform us

item.title: The Scout Team Podcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1
item.itunes:summary: Kyle and I have a civilized discourse about the sporting world in which we live. We try to keep it humorous and enjoyable while still talking about sports. We hit on some things ESPN won't talk about including soccer and hockey! Yes soccer and hockey! Have a listen and let us know what you think at teamcajonespodcast@gmail.com. Episode mistakes: Sean Paul is Jamaican
